Text: I love electronic music but have to say this album sucks
this is the best fucking dance music ever!
a very good album. love Justice!
I just heard a little bit of Justice LIVE and I was amazed! Damn nice!!!

You are easily amused, and its definetly not the best electro dance ive heard. 

Check out some of the Goa psy trance artists, and think again. 

*Justice is still a nice group, 3-4 good songs. nothing else.

@rjd22
I agree, trance sux! But Haraldur is right. Goa (or psy-trance) isn't as lame as real trance... Go and check out some DJ's like 'Juno Reactor' or 'Infected Mushroom' You'll see their not boring...
yeah i luuv electro and house music, but this album is not more than mediocre. 3 out of 5.

I really like Justice, the song D.A.N.C.E is just great, and a nice looking vid as well. 
French people have really taken music to the next level, i expect french music will become bigger in the future.
